website_summaries.verdict: The CS WP is the ClimaShield and Waterproof version of the XA Pro 3D. It uses the CS technology to keep the feet warm for winter forays on the most challenging trails. The shoe is extremely stable, highly-durable, and built for the serious pounding at slow to moderate speeds.
pros: Many of the reviewers swear by the awesome comfort of the XA Pro 3D CS WP
It has excellent traction, based on the comments of several hikers and runners
The Sensifit overlays provide exceptional midfoot hold
According to several users, these are very well-made shoes
The QuickLace system offers ease and convenience in getting the right fit
Offers more color options than past versions of the XA Pro 3D series
A significant number of reviewers mentioned that the arch support is superb
The durability of the XA Pro 3D CS WP is first-rate, as reported by several runners
The lugs are self-cleaning, based on the experience of some runners
A handful of runners really liked the shoe’s capacity to keep their feet warm during winter
cons: It is too stiff for some runners
It runs a little small and narrow, as noted by more than a few runners
The shoe is very heavy for a handful of runners
A good number of runners noted that the shoe made a crunching sound that irritated them
Several runners complained that the speed laces have a very short lifespan

customer_reviews.title: Salomon must keep their eye on the Quality Control Department
customer_reviews.text: Salomon's XA Pro 3D CS has been my go to trail shoe for a number of years. I wear out 3 pairs per year, but this pair came apart after 2 months. It appears Salomon must of had a QA/QC problem with their adhesives as the sole detached for the uppers. I will give them another chance and order another pair with the thought their QA/QC was off the day the defective pair was made. Very disappointed and surprised such a proven manufacturer of quality shoes allowed this batch to be shipped to the consumers.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A Beam

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs one full size too small
customer_reviews.text: I have had a version of this shoe for ten years and love them. Waterproof and very comfortable. The laces make it very easy to put on. Often I do not even tighten the laces when just wearing around the house. But they run extremely small. I usually wear size 9 but need to take a size 10 in this shoe. To be on the safe side order them in three sizes. Yur size and one a half size larger and another a full size larger. Then return the ons that dont fit.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe; no need to have a similar shoe for like hiking conditions: these are my go-to low cut hikers.
customer_reviews.text: These are really great shoes, for Spring and Fall hiking. I was very skeptical of the quick lace system but now I really like the system. Doesn't slip at all for me. They're very comfortable out of the box, and I've been using them around town when the weather is wet or some snow on the ground. The fit is perfect and I use a medium weight Winter sock. Can't use a heavy weight sock. They look good too, for what's it worth. I'd use these for wet Summer hikes, but perhaps would find maybe a lighter Gore-tex shoe for the Summer as these are lightly insulated, which we wouldn't really need for the Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is there, Waterproofing is not!
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of these shoes, one with the breathable mesh, and this pair that I bought specifically for the waterproofing capabilities. I’m sad to report that shortly after wearing this “WP” version on an early morning walk in grass with dew, my feet were soaked. I tried a second time through wet grass again yesterday to confirm, and unfortunately, my feet were soaked again. These are not waterproof. I like this shoe because they are comfortable, but I’m going to need to stay with my Addidas Terrex with Gor-Tex for waterproofing. Those are phenomenal! Just a little less comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hutton

customer_reviews.title: a great shoe. I ended up using them for running ...
customer_reviews.text: These surprisingly fit as expected, although I expected a narrow shoe. Hiked 25 miles rim to rim across the grand canyon with no problem.Two nails on middle toes got bruised a bit, but this is expected. I think they will survive. I wear running/cross country shoes at 10.5, snowboarding shoes in size 11. I ordered these in size 11, which was right on the spot. Overall, a great shoe. I ended up using them for running on the beach, as their waterproofness helps getting through some narrow spots on the beach at high tide.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof? HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to walk my dog through WET GRASS in the mornings. Not wade through puddles, not endless miles of running on muddy trails. Within 10 minutes of walking, my feet are soaked. They get a star for good fit and comfort, but the main reason I bought these was for the waterproofing, at which they fail miserably. My leather reeboks from 1994 have better waterproofing than these. If you expect these to keep your feet dry, you will be disappointed. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Concilliator

customer_reviews.title: Sole failed 3 months after warranty
customer_reviews.text: This would've been a 5 star review because these are some of the best trail shoes I have ever owned. But I am dismayed that the front toe cracked and the sole separated on one of shoes. This is only with regular use as street shoes and occasional use on trail runs. This shoe is built like a tank so you'd think it would last more than 2 years. I would like to see Salomon still honor the warranty but we'll see....
customer_reviews.author: Atsy

customer_reviews.title: soloman shoes aren't worth the cost even if they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several Solomon trail running shoes. They all had the souls separating from the body of the shoe after 5-10 months. I only wore them to walk through woods and fields. No running, just walking. I kept buying them anyway because I like the quick lacing feature and thought a different model or a different shoe in the same model wouldn't have the problem. I was wrong and decided that I had bought my last pair. The waterproofing claim for all of Solomon shoes including the Gortex brand is bogus. Simply walking through wet grass made my socks wet.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Lee

customer_reviews.title: same comfort, different fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems to run about a half size small in comparison to the non CS WP version (normally 11, but 11.5 fits me better here). Similar comfort and narrow fit, but breaks in nicely. Waterproofing, although a few generations behind Gortex's breathability, seems to work well. Only real gripe is that the sidewall comes up to rub on bottom of my ankle more than I've experienced with other Salomons. Would still recommend, but try them on somewhere first.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Cragan

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money. These shoes are stylish, lack the clunky bulky nature of traditional hiking shoes. The zip laces instead of traditional laces create a worry free hiking experience. They have a phenomenal grip, keep a reasonable amount of water out, and If rocks get in, you barley feel them due to the cushioning inside. Very enjoyable shoes
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: The waterproofing makes it very hard to breathe
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend, and he tried it out and said within a few hours of use (not anything sportish) it becomes very hot inside, much more then a blandstone shoe (is that how you write that?), Which those shoes are usually very non breathable, but these took it to the next step... I gave it a 3 star because I only put them on once just to check the fir, but didn't get enough experience to choose make up my mind anymore then the breathable fact...
customer_reviews.author: Light

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to find a shoe that fits just right. Especially an every day shoe for work. This shoe is it. This is my third pair. I am a highway construction inspector and I walk about 5-7 miles per day on average. Some days much more, and over varied terrain. I never have numbness nor blisters. And I get about 3 years of use before they start to age.
customer_reviews.author: Svea Burska

customer_reviews.title: I still wear them a year later
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work. They were waterproof and got me through the day. I wouldn't work out in them because they feel a bit heavy, but maybr for hiking? I am a stickler and tend towards lighter nike shoes for running and the gym. I still wear these several times a week, almost a year after buying them
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Hot!!
customer_reviews.text: I have three older pairs of the Trail Running XA Pro 3D and when I tried on these new Trail Running shoes it was apparent that these would be returned right away. Too hot and no breathability. I am in So Cal and today was a cool autumn 80 deg. day. Maybe in the northwest these would be ideal shoes but down here breath-ability wins the day. Watertight=No Breath-ability
customer_reviews.author: Escondido

customer_reviews.title: kept me dry
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for about 4 months now for hiking and being outside in the rain at ball games. Feet stay dry. In hiking socks they feel very comfortable. In ankle socks, the front of the ankle cut out sits a little high and rubs the sides of my ankles. Overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Foulballchaser

customer_reviews.title: Husband LOVES these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been praising Salomon shoes for a few years now. We’re Hiking in Colorado,Utah and Arizona the end of September . I’ve recently purchased the Alphacross GTX and they’re made for hiking and they’re waterproof too. My husband needed new shoes so I purchased Salomon Men's Xa Pro 3D CSWP Trail Running for him. He cannot get over how comfortable they are. We can’t wait to hit the trails in our Salomon shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tootie

customer_reviews.title: runs narrow and short
customer_reviews.text: stiff sole on shoe ( a plus), good support grippy sole. Shoe does not breathe in waterproof model and runs hot. Too Narrow in forefoot, my foot not large bought half size larger but toe occ touches shoe end with thin socks. Trying to break them in- first day 17,000 steps. If don’t love them when you try them on, keep looking. These are expensive shoes to sit in closet.
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Great (Sneaker Type) Waterproof Shoes !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Hiking and Just Running Around Town Type Sneaker Type Shoes...however, can be a slight bit slippery on freshly chemically cleaned smooth floors. MUCH BETTER on Rugged Terrain or Even Simply Wet Floors...but Floor Disinfectants will have you Ice Skating on Non Icy Floors.
customer_reviews.author: KEN ESTEP

customer_reviews.title: Super Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Salomon sneakers. The first pair lasted seven years and the string broke, sneakers were still great. Regular store bought sneakers normally last me about seven to eight months. The Salomon shoes take much longer to break in than normal brands but are the best and longest lasting on the market. I will never buy another brand period, well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Arrowhuntr

customer_reviews.title: My Third pair of Salomon, great umpiring shoe too!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide flat feet and they fit true to size, do not feel crunched in the width. Comfortable, great traction, and support. I use these for some hiking but mostly for umpiring baseball, football, and coaching soccer. Since I am dealing with wet conditions sometimes and wet practice grass, they are a great shoe for staying dry. Nothing worse than working in wet socks for hours. This is my third pair of Salomon's, worth a try. When hiking trails and even off-trail, excellent traction and support.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Let say just this hot weather cold weather woods regular city doesn't matter where you are this shoes follow you the felling is great when you wear them so powerful and they look great plus quality is for sure on Solomon's side
customer_reviews.author: Dusan T.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: A friend turned me onto these several years ago and I have not gone back to any other brand. I wore my last pair everyday for over 2 years and they finally gave way to the harsh heat in Africa. That was only due to being at the over 2 year mark! I had another pair that I popped the synch strap and Salomon sent me out a replacement strap.
customer_reviews.author: Willr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy WP trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: I tried on a very overpriced pair at REI so I knew the size I wanted. Ordered online and got just what I wanted at a big discount. Good sturdy WaterProof trail shoe for single track. Not for backpacking, but that's not why I got it. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good design and water resistance but no comfort. Buen diseño pero nada de confort
customer_reviews.text: It is completely waterproof and practical to tie and versatile design but if you train two days in a row with those shoes they leave you an excruciating pain in your feet since they are extremely flat and hard on the inside .. so I will try buying some extra insoles and see if they fit . Es completamente impermeable y práctica de amarrar y diseño versátil pero si entrenas dos días seguidos con esos zapatos te dejan un dolor insoportable en los pies ya que son extremadamente planas y duras en el interior
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo

customer_reviews.title: they are water proof I love the speed laces footbed is quite form fitting and ...
customer_reviews.text: over the years I have owned several pair of these shoes. consistent fit every time, they wear well.. they are water proof I love the speed laces footbed is quite form fitting and heel stays in place. typically, like with this pair, i am replacing some that have some serious use. I am on my feet all day at work and in a garden center atmosphere there is water and mud around all the time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lace system so far
customer_reviews.text: They are some what right in the foot but I like that in my shoes.. so far so good with water proof I work out side and use them daily and have not had any issues. They have a good lace system that’s easy to get it shoe on a off. Better than merrels in my opinion. I would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are great for narrow or medium width feet that need good arch support. My teens' feet keep growing and I just keep buying the next size up. When my son passed my foot size the shoes were still in great shape so now I wear them and they're very comfortable. My other teen broke her quick-lace when her shoes were about 8 months old. I contacted Salomon and they gave me a free replacement.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Their great if you don’t wear them a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after doing research and wanted to try something new to replace my north face hikers that I wore out. I bought these back in June 2019 and I can’t even wear them anymore. They hurt my feet and it feels like the ball of my foot is on the ground. The liners wore out so quickly and I’m seriously disappointed especially for the price. I knew I should just bought another pair of north face.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: My ONLY type of athletic shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand/style of shoe ever since discovering it in a hiking store in the Dolomites 8 years ago. I buy a pair every year and they last me throughout the year. I especially like the waterproof feature, great for either rain or puddles. Always holds my ankle and foot in place.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: had a pair of old Merrels that had a similar set up and did not like,.
customer_reviews.text: was very skeptical about the shoe lace system on these shoes, had a pair of old Merrels that had a similar set up and did not like,... the Salomon's system is wayyyyy better,... even better than traditional laces! Super quick, and tucks away neatly- Shoes look great, and fit nicely on me too, I will wear these for everything!
customer_reviews.author: One busy guy!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, wore out WAY too fast
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes. Very comfortable, good tread, effective waterproofing. I was telling everyone I know and their brothers that they should buy a pair. Unfortunately a little over two months into owning them and using them about 3-4 times per week exclusively to play disc golf, the sole separated from the shoe making the waterproofing and tread irrelevant. For anyone that plays disc golf, it is also noteworthy that it was not on my planting foot, but my trailing foot, so it wasn't torque that separated the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The only shoe for working out I'll buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. It's firm, so if you like softer style shoes, it's not for you, however it's very comfortable and provides you great support. I use it for hiking, camping, biking, working out and even work and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Halftwit2

customer_reviews.title: Great WP shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 12, but they did not stretch after three weeks of steady wear. So I went up to 12.5, and they fit beautifully. I really like the rubber toe, and the traction on the sole is not over abundant as some of the other models.
customer_reviews.author: Ono Grindz

customer_reviews.title: They are a great fitting shoe thanks to the quick lace system
customer_reviews.text: They are a great fitting shoe thanks to the quick lace system. The traction is also great too for most types of terrains. They aren’t as waterproof as id like though. My biggest complaint is the longevity of the shoe. They typically only last me 7-8 months of hard daily use but their warranty department is always on point
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable. The shoe is not for the summer as your feet will be very warm or hot. Almost the perfect shoe but i wore them on a smooth surface and literally almost slid down football bleachers. Now, i would think these would be perfect for the trail but for my purpose i would wear all around town and camping. So i think this is specifically made for only the trails.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Well built but hot and small in size
customer_reviews.text: Well built but hot and small in size, great stability for hiking and walking. Hot while working indoors and the size is a little tighter than most shoes but not to the point to were it's too uncomfortable. I would get a half of size larger next time and seems most other reviews agree. Easy lacing up and removing witch is a plus. Half a size bigger and a cooler day outside and it would be the perfect shoe :) "Excellent cool wet/dry weather hiking shoe!"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wear daily. Used to hike My Hood during some seriously unappreciated snowfall during a hiking trip. Was worried at first but no reason. No issues after 3 days hiking between snow at altitude and rain as we dropped altitude. My go to brand!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes covered my toes and easy to tie with the draw string. Fits a little large, but I love them. They are comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Absinthe

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very Reliable Top Quailty I Continue To Keep Buying This Product I Have To Honestly Say I Am Hard On Footwear So Basically I Am Only Getting 9-13 Months Out Of This Sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: UnderDog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for deep woods trail running.
customer_reviews.text: Excellence. Perfect tread. Not too aggressive not too flat. 3-D chassis hold your heal in place. Sole grips up in to arches. Plenty of protection in the toe box. Waterproofing works great. Speed lace system is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. stable, durable, fit well
customer_reviews.text: My fourth pair of XA Pro 3Ds. I've tried others but keep coming back to these. Love 'em. The waterproofing works well and, like Goretex, is breathable but not cool. They are very stable, fit my low volume foot, and last. As long as Salomon keeps making these shoes, I'll keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: rotorelief

customer_reviews.title: Right foot shoe too narrow!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Salomon shoes before and had no issues with them. This was the first pair of Salomon Men's XA Pro 3D CS Waterproof Trail Runner's I tried. I was surprised and disappointed when I wore them for the first time. The right foot shoe as so narrow it started hurting my outer foot! I wore them all day to try to break them in but the shoe stayed tight and uncomfortable. These shoes are $145! You would think they would have better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Walked all over Germany
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding shoes. I was hesitant about buying a wide size....but all of the Salomon shoes I tried were pretty narrow. These fit perfect. I walked all over Germany during my Vacation and my feet never complained.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: My son’s favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: My adult son has been reordering this same shoe every 6 months for years. His only complaint is that the back wears out before the rest of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ellen sf

customer_reviews.title: Run to Feel Free
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my high instep always had to buy extra ones for my shoes these are Built In and ready to Run
customer_reviews.author: Toy Win

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Hiking
customer_reviews.text: Salomon makes great high-end athletic shoes. These are water proof and specially good for road walking early in the morning. When I hear or see a car coming, I get off the road, into the grass and continue walking without getting my feet wet.
customer_reviews.author: MLIEBER507

customer_reviews.title: No brake in needed, but order 1/2 or 1 size larger
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I had to return the size 12 that I originally ordered for a 13. Now they fort like a glove. I have not tested the waterproofing capabilities yet, but I will this weekend. They did not need any brake in at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christo Valiotis

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes, just wish top of tongue was 1/4” wider, creates a gap between tongue and top of shoe. Very comfortable and solid with easy zip lace-up system. Seems high quality, like we expect from Solomon.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD L GERZMEHLE

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: TL;DR as long as you are moving the shoes are fine. Need to stand for any length of time and they become uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Trytko

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I was intending to wear them just for hiking, but I find myself wearing them just for normal every day wear. I find them very comfortable and stable. The only complaint I have is the waterproofing. Whenever I step in a stream or puddle when hiking my toes end up damp (not soaked, just as if water is slowly seeping in from somewhere). I haven't figured out what's going on there, but it's annoying since my primary purpose for buying these was the waterproof feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Quimby

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 12, ordered that, then 12.5 finally a 13 fits perfectly. Great shoes. I wear Salomon Boots and running shoes, these shoes will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Snarfle Barbin

customer_reviews.title: My problem with mens xa pro 3d
customer_reviews.text: First of all i am a big fan of Solmon. They have one of the best shoes. I had different snikersies of Solmon and i never had a problem, except for now. I have a bloody encle using Solmons Xa pro 3d only in one day. I dont know whats the problem but its my first bad experience with Solmon. I think i deserve some compansation.
customer_reviews.author: tato

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great for hiking, slippery on ice. The quick secure laces are different but love it. I’ll definitely buy more of this brand
customer_reviews.author: souksamlane sengsuwane

customer_reviews.title: Makes my feet feel like butterflies are caressing them
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever had. I feel like I need to stock up in case for some crazy reason they stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has held up perfectly for long-distance hiking and summer elk spotting. It is sturdy, supportive and very water-resistant. The insoles are better than any stock insole I have ever had. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rosson Richardson

customer_reviews.title: They look great, but ....
customer_reviews.text: Most of the previous reviews are dead on. In a nutshell, they are a bit small (i ordered 1/2 size larger as suggested), they make your feet hot, they make a crinkling sound when you walk, and they cut into the ankle bone. This may be a show stopper, but i will wear them more to decide how bothersome it will be before i decide if i will return them. On the plus side, they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these shoes. The soles are literally coming off making them useless and no longer waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: OKAY
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and quality but I think it is a bit too stiff .I will buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad cushion and not really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not really waterproof. Terrible insole. I walk dogs and within a week it gave me planters fasciitus.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not only I like this shoes, I love it! You cant go wrong with Salomon. I believe this brand has a reputation of good quality and reliability with their products. I used mine as soon as I got it. And what ever it says on the specs and features, they really meant it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit good and I use it to work out in
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and walks comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and walks comfortable. Water proof as advertised. Only real complaint is the material isn't breathable. So after a few hours of walking around in the shoes, your feet are a bit damp.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Well worth the money most comfortable sneaker I’ve ever worn! Fits as expected just slightly narrow in the toe area and I do not have a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for hiking in Canada. Feet stayed nice and dry, didn't feel any rocks under the sole, stylish and comfortable. Great purchase. Excellent comfort and stability on a 15 mile hike with lots of rocks mud, and snow patches.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They’re comfortable. Shipped on time. The fit is as expected. The only problem I have, they don’t seem to last long. The stitching on the side started coming undone after 6 months and the sole started to separate after 9 months. I expected these to stand up to normal wear and tear; however, that does not seem to be the case. By the way, these are not my hiking shoes; I use these as my daily shoes to and from the office and back home.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Derr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sports shoes ! Sturdy, yet comfortable & light. And 100% waterproof ! Definitely an "all-terrain" kind of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe nice and solid feel. I rated the fit as expected because I ordered a half size up from my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: George Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. Searched the entire internet to find then, then voila, they're on Amazon. Super comfy, high quality, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Noisy shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe has a great fit. The waterproofing is a bit noisy around the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Machu Picchu ready
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried I hadn't broken these in as I purchased them just 2 weeks before my Machu Picchu hike. I wore them to work for 2 days before my big hike. The hike was 9 straight hours of up and down old incan stone stairs. Never had a blister, no discomfort, no foot pain. It was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: Use these for everything from tactical running, range time, and casual wear. Love them. Fit nice, durable, and although I wouldn’t run in them outside of tactical training, they provide a solid platform Over boots!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew torres

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Lace loop wore through and broke after 4 months of infrequent use. Performed well, but considering these were not worn as an everyday shoe as I bought these for when/after it rained, I expected them to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: SLarsen

customer_reviews.title: Fit and perform beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: Will never buy anything other than Solomon. Built strong and last forever
customer_reviews.author: Sean S

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great. I work and live in a sandy environment ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I work and live in a sandy environment in Southern Utah and these shoes have been exactly what I was looking for to keep the sand, dirt, and water off of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Lace clasps on both sides tore after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: We used to buy a pair of Solomons and they would last years. Now the clasps keep ripping and we have to sew them back on since the return window has closed. Super disappointed and no longer trust Solomon Shoes to last. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Darosi

customer_reviews.title: I love these and am replacing a size 11 that i ...
customer_reviews.text: The toughest shoes ever! I love these and am replacing a size 11 that i wore out and were too small. I wear size 12 but these are a touch too big to where the heel is not snug. I returned the 12 for an 11.5 and they are perfect. Buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Criswell

customer_reviews.title: Check the shoes as soon as they come.
customer_reviews.text: I received two shoes that were two different colors. I’ll let you know if it works out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe. Works great in a he winter here. I NEED TO GET THINNER SOCKS. For summer hiking, hopefully it'll be broken in by then.
customer_reviews.author: gnowbmas

customer_reviews.title: Size and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Runs too narrow for my size. I am 11, I will try 12
customer_reviews.author: Jose gabriel lugo

customer_reviews.title: get a half size larger than what you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 12 mens us, got the 12.5 like a lot of reviews recommended getting the half size larger, they were right, 12.5 fits perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bombback

customer_reviews.title: Salomon shoes are the BEST and their lacing system is so unique
customer_reviews.text: Salomon shoes are the BEST and their lacing system is so unique. Love the quality and durability of their shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Philip, San Jose CA

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!! Love them but they broke
customer_reviews.text: Is there any kind of refund or exchange for something that breaks???? I love these shoes, that are amazing. However one of the pieces broke that holds the laces and I can’t wear them any more. I have only had them for 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Salomon shoes until this pair....unfortunately I am on a cruise with these pair and they are killing my feet
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L.

customer_reviews.title: Rub on outside of ankle
customer_reviews.text: I always wore Salomon Speedcross when trail running but wanted something with just a little wider toe box and these are good for that. The problem is they are too high on the outside and rub into bottom of my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Willeze

customer_reviews.title: good, durable shoe
customer_reviews.text: One of my feet is weird.....left foot, little toe. For some reason, half the shoes I buy rub against this toe and I can't wear them. These shoes not only fit well, but no issues with the toe!!! Really like the pull laces.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Order a full size larger
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you order larger than the normal US Size. I wear a 12 and had to return to get it in a 13. This is with all 3 pair of my Salomons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best show of all time.....I don’t care what you say
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof but not hot. Boot stability with sneaker weight. Lacing system pulls from the sole of the shoe for a non-hotspot snug fit. I’ve bought multiples for fear of them changing it for the worse...
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the Boy Scout Jamboree.
customer_reviews.text: Nice trail shoe. Wore them on many camping trips and for the 10 day Boy Scout Jamboree. Love that they don't have laces and you don't have to worry about the tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog walking / pet care business so I can wear a pair of shoes out in months. This is my third pair of Gore-Tex Salomons. They’re durable (each pair lasts about 400-500miles), comfortable and keep you dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow. I have tried to break them in but no luck. I would return them if I hadn't already worn them. I don't normally order wide but in this case I with I had.
customer_reviews.author: brandon h

customer_reviews.title: SO. HOT. SO MUCH SWEAT. MAGMA.
customer_reviews.text: You know that whole exploding Volcano thing in Hawaii? I've never been to Hawaii, but I'm pretty sure the first fissure erupted in these shoes and a new one opens up every time I wear them. These have ZERO breathability. Zero. They are comfortable, they are seemingly well built, but they are hotter than you know where.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! Served me well on my trek up Mt Fuji. No issues with fit, comfort, or performance
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time, thanks!
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes 90 percent of the time. They really help my plantar issues.
customer_reviews.author: Neil M. Geitner

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Christmas. He loves them. I tried his on and liked them so much I bought myself a pair. Very comfortable and great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, otherwise and feet stay dry as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A little snug, but that's to be expected until they're broken in. Very comfortable, otherwise and feet stay dry as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Order a 1/2 size larger than Speed 4's
customer_reviews.text: These run about a half size smaller that Speed 4's
customer_reviews.author: Frank Papp

customer_reviews.title: Hi quality!
customer_reviews.text: Truly impressive the quality of these shoes. I use them daily for work and my daily tasks. Thank you very much, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever worn actually I bought two more pairs of the same exact shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: fit and support
customer_reviews.text: MY husband and I both have a pair. Superb fit and support. No shoelaces to come untied.
customer_reviews.author: Considerate Spouse

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, waterproof, durable!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has a few pairs of these shoes & he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Xa Pro 3D CSWP Trail Running
product_meta.description: The proven, all-weather adventure shoe with climashield™ waterproof delivers an incredible fit, durability, and a grip that inspires confidence.
feature_bullets: ALL-TERRAIN ADVENTURE: Featuring a protective toe cap, wet traction grip, 3D advanced chassis for stability, & waterproof lining the XA Pro 3D ClimaSalomon WP is a shoe that lets you play long & hard on any terrain.

NO SUCH THING AS BAD WEATHER: With an aggressive grip, stability, & protection the iconic Salomon XA Pro 3D line of shoes is perfect for hiking, backpacking, or trail running on every type of terrain.

GO THE DISTANCE: Whether you love daily road running in your neighborhood, an escape to a local trail, or something more rugged, Salomon makes shoes that ensure you have a smooth ride on any & all terrain.
TIME TO PLAY: Whether you are into trail running, hiking, backpacking, or mountaineering, Salomon has shoes & gear for kids, men & women to help you conquer a new distance, personal record, or event!
SINCE 1947 Salomon has used our passion for outdoor sports & innovation to create progressive gear. Our road & trail running shoes, hiking sneakers, boots, & water shoes help make any path your own.
